mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, BOARD_NO, WRITER, NICK_NAME, CATEGORY, TITLE, CONTENT, BOARD_DATE, STATUS, BOARD_LEVEL, REF_NO, BOARD_STATUS FROM (SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.WRITER, M.NICK_NAME, B.CATEGORY, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT, B.BOARD_DATE, B.STATUS "STATUS", B.BOARD_LEVEL, B.REF_NO, S.STATUS "BOARD_STATUS" FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.WRITER = M.USER_NO) JOIN BOARD_STATUS S ON(B.BOARD_NO = S.BOARD_NO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND B.BOARD_LEVEL = 1 AND B.CATEGORY = #{category} ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO ASC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5 ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC
